name: Sci-Fi FPS Demo
description:
Hey guys, here is a small game I built over the course of a few days. The assets were created by Unity Technologies, and this game was built as a part of a course on Udemy.

If you're wondering, I am responsible for the lighting effects and the programming (logic) of the game.

--------IMPORTANT------------------------------

WHEN YOU OPEN THE GAME, LOOK FOR A COIN NEAR THE SHARKMAN. 

GO NEAR THE COIN, AND PRESS E ON YOUR KEYBOARD TO COLLECT IT.

GO TO THE SHARKMAN AND PRESS E AGAIN TO BUY A GUN.

NOW YOU CAN SHOOT ALL YOU WANT. PRESS R TO RELOAD.

PRESS ESC TO QUIT.
